name: Loaded Runner
shortDescription: A side-scrolling action runner game set in an industrial environment, featuring shooting and melee combat.
fullDescription: Loaded Runner is a fast-paced, side-scrolling action platformer. Players control a young character who navigates across industrial platforms and avoids obstacles in a pipe-filled, factory-like setting. Unlike traditional runners, the game incorporates combat mechanics, providing the player with on-screen controls for jumping/moving (arrow), shooting (gun icon), and melee combat (fist/lightning icon). The objective is to achieve a high score and collect yellow star coins.
